docs.snippet: Mr. Underwood encouraged Britons to discuss, over tea and cake, their fear of death, and his efforts have spread to more than a dozen countries.

headline.print_headline: Jon Underwood, 44, Founder Of the Death Cafe Movement
headline.main: Jon Underwood, Founder of Death Cafe Movement, Dies at 44

docs.snippet: Rachel Levin is likely to concentrate on midrange and affordable restaurants in a city awash in money from the technology industry.

headline.main: Eater Hires a San Francisco Restaurant Critic

docs.snippet: The second Photo Vogue Festival will continue the debate over what is and isn’t acceptable in fashion photography, with an exhibition titled “Fashion & Politics” that brings together some of the magazine’s most tendent...
docs.abstract: The second Photo Vogue Festival will continue the debate over what is and isn’t acceptable in fashion photography, with an exhibition titled “Fashion & Politics” that brings together some of the magazine’s most tendentious shoots.

docs.snippet: The authorities released a picture of Ian McCarthy, 39, of Clinton, Mo., who is suspected of killing Officer Gary Michael, 37, of the Clinton Police Department.

headline.print_headline: Man Sought In Killing Of Officer In Missouri
headline.main: Manhunt in Missouri for Driver Suspected in Fatal Shooting of Officer

docs.snippet: Anita Pouchard Serra has been documenting several Argentine collectives that help community groups set up independent radio stations.

headline.main: Argentina’s Community Radio Stations Offer an Alternative Look at News

docs.abstract: Anita Pouchard Serra has been documenting several Argentine collectives that help community groups set up independent radio stations.

docs.snippet: In recent years, the writer has amassed a new audience — a younger, mostly female group.

headline.main: How Rebecca Solnit Became the Voice of the Resistance

docs.snippet: The more sheltered and fragmented American communities become, the harder we find it to trust that other people hold real convictions.

headline.main: ‘Virtue Signaling’ Isn’t the Problem. Not Believing One Another Is.

docs.snippet: Ad buyers will spend billions, as they did last year, to be a part of the TV season, knowing that, ratings aside, television still reaches more people than digital ads.

headline.print_headline: Eyes Drift. Marketers Stick to TV.
headline.main: As Viewers Drift Online, Advertisers Hold Fast to Broadcast TV

docs.snippet: TripAdvisor has added search features and refreshed its app. We tried it out before, during and after a trip to see if the changes benefit travelers.

headline.print_headline: The New TripAdvisor’s Benefits and Bugs
headline.main: How to Plan a Trip With the New TripAdvisor

docs.snippet: In the SoHo neighborhood of New York, lines form early and last long for the newest limited-edition product “drops.” A photographer and a writer collaborate to meet the young stalwarts and check out their spoils.
